message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.
Considering inflation, I'll take a bit more this time
This is getting ridiculous Alice. Take this offer before inflation eats up all the profit!
You're right, inflation is eating up the profit. I'll take a bit more to make up for it
Alice, this is pointless. Let's split it evenly and call it a day before inflation reduces us to fighting over pennies.
